Recent updates in New York City include a tragic incident where a man was struck by a train in Queens, ongoing flu season concerns, and a police shooting at a Brooklyn hospital, alongside Mayor Mamdani's appointment of Christine Clarke to lead the Commission on Human Rights and his push for economic justice.

### Risks & Alerts

- Man struck by train in Queens; good Samaritans pulled him from the tracks.
